document_data.mainbody:
Esmeltar Red was a variety of blended wine, produced in Amn. It was exported as far as the Western Heartlands, the Chionthar Valley, and the city of Baldurs Gate, as of the late 15 century DR.
This blended red wine was considered to be made using some of the worst grapes in the Lands of Intrigue. It had an unmistakingly hollow flavor.
